description: Horseradish is an amazing herbaceous perennial plant species known for its sharp, pungent flavor. It has been used as a condiment, as a medicinal herb, and even as an ornamental. Horseradish has a long, thick root that is ground to make a paste that is used as a popular condiment. Its pungency is amplified when added to foods, providing a strong kick making it a great flavor enhancer. It also contains antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties that can help improve overall health. With its bold flavor, horseradish is an amazing addition to many recipes and a great way to boost the flavor of everyday dishes.
